content.raw: Do you have plans to enable instrumentation by command line? For example `gazebo --instrument <filename to dump data>` or `gazebo --hf5 <filename>`. It doesn't have to be in this PR, but it seems inconvenient to comment/uncomment the `#define INSTRUMENT` line.
content.html: Do you have plans to enable instrumentation by command line? For example gazebo --instrument <filename to dump data> or gazebo --hf5 <filename>. It doesn't have to be in this PR, but it seems inconvenient to comment/uncomment the #define INSTRUMENT line.
